entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
